${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbyssForm.NAME: Abyss Form
${modID}:AbyssForm.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card with dragonknight:Brand in a turn, trigger dragonknight:Be_Dragon.

${modID}:DragonScale.NAME: Dragon Scale
${modID}:DragonScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted, gain an additional !M! Block.

${modID}:Sweeping.NAME: Sweeping
${modID}:Sweeping.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When Exhausted, deal an additional !D! damage.

${modID}:WhiteRealm.NAME: White Realm
${modID}:WhiteRealm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, trigger cards which are  Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand one extra time. If  Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , gain 5 Strength , and enter dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form next turn.

${modID}:FuriousFlames.NAME: Furious Flames
${modID}:FuriousFlames.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Each time dragonknight:Brand is triggered in this combat, gain 3 additional damage.

${modID}:BrandProtector.NAME: Brand Protector
${modID}:BrandProtector.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each card  Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand this turn.

${modID}:WhiteBrand.NAME: White Brand
${modID}:WhiteBrand.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:BlackBrand.NAME: Black Brand
${modID}:BlackBrand.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:PhantomDragon.NAME: Phantom Dragon
${modID}:PhantomDragon.DESCRIPTION: The first card played each combat after dragonknight:Be_Dragon does not consume [E] .
${modID}:PhantomDragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first card played each combat after dragonknight:Be_Dragon does not consume [E] .

${modID}:KingsBrand.NAME: King's Brand
${modID}:KingsBrand.DESCRIPTION: Retain . NL Gain 1 Artifact . ALL enemies lose 1 Strength. Whenever you trigger dragonknight:Be_Dragon, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
${modID}:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, shuffle another *Judgement into the draw pile.
${modID}:Judgement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, shuffle another *Judgement+ into the draw pile.

${modID}:Banish.NAME: Banish
${modID}:Banish.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If in dragonknight:Be_Dragon, dragonknight:Brand can now choose a card from the draw pile.

${modID}:Convict.NAME: Convict
${modID}:Convict.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ApostlesComing.NAME: Apostles Coming
${modID}:ApostlesComing.DESCRIPTION: Gain temporary Strength equal to half the Block value gained this turn. NL (Gain !M! temporary Strength )

${modID}:RebornScale.NAME: Reborn Scale
${modID}:RebornScale.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted, shuffle another *Reborn *Scale into the draw pile.
${modID}:RebornScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When Exhausted, shuffle another *Reborn *Scale+ into the draw pile.

${modID}:FusionBrand.NAME: Fusion Brand
${modID}:FusionBrand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, reducing their cost by 1 this turn. NL If a dragonknight:Brand card is drawn or has "dragonknight:Brand" in its name, gain [E] [E] . NL When  Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Fusion *Brand into the discard pile.
${modID}:FusionBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, reducing their cost by 1 this turn. NL If a dragonknight:Brand card is drawn or has "dragonknight:Brand" in its name, gain [E] [E] . NL When  Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Fusion *Brand+ into the discard pile.

${modID}:MourningBrand.NAME: Mourning Brand
${modID}:MourningBrand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If at least one card was Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand at the end of the last turn, gain [E] [E] , draw !M! cards, and trigger dragonknight:Brand once.

${modID}:Trample.NAME: Trample
${modID}:Trample.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL If in dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form, gain 1 Strength. If in dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form, gain [E] .

${modID}:CrimsonBrand.NAME: Crimson Brand
${modID}:CrimsonBrand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 dragonknight:Brand card. If the number of Exhausted cards exceeds 12, draw an additional !M! cards; if it exceeds 20, gain [E] [E] . When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Crimson *Brand into the discard pile.
${modID}:CrimsonBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 dragonknight:Brand card. If the number of Exhausted cards exceeds 20, draw an additional !M! cards; if it exceeds 20, gain [E] [E] [E] . When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Crimson *Brand+ into the discard pile.

${modID}:SwordBrand.NAME: Sword Brand
${modID}:SwordBrand.DESCRIPTION: Grant dragonknight:Temporary_Brand to all Skill cards in your hand. NL When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Sword *Brand into the discard pile.
${modID}:SwordBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grant dragonknight:Temporary_Brand to all Skill cards in your hand. NL When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , shuffle another *Sword *Brand+ into the discard pile.

${modID}:ColdAirflow.NAME: Cold Airflow
${modID}:ColdAirflow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply !M! temporary Strength reduction. When Exhausted, first remove ALL enemies' Block.

${modID}:SeparateBrand.NAME: Separate Brand
${modID}:SeparateBrand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the number of cards Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand in the last turn exceeds 2, deal !M! additional damage. When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand, shuffle another *Separate *Brand into the discard pile.
${modID}:SeparateBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the number of cards Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand in the last turn exceeds 2, deal !M! additional damage. When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand, shuffle another *Separate *Brand+ into the discard pile.

${modID}:Bite.NAME: Bite
${modID}:Bite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! temporary Strength reduction to the target.

${modID}:AshBrand.NAME: Ash Brand
${modID}:AshBrand.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, randomly add a copy of the card Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand last turn with Exhaust and Ethereal to your hand.
${modID}:AshBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, randomly add a copy of the card Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand last turn with Exhaust and Ethereal to your hand.

${modID}:Roar.NAME: Roar
${modID}:Roar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every 2 times you play a card with "dragonknight:Brand" in its name, return this card from the discard pile to your hand (can only return once each time). NL When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand, shuffle another *Roar into the draw pile.
${modID}:Roar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every 2 times you play a card with "dragonknight:Brand" in its name, return this card from the discard pile to your hand (can only return once each time). NL When Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand, shuffle another *Roar+ into the draw pile.

${modID}:IceDevilBrand.NAME: Ice Devil Brand
${modID}:IceDevilBrand.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies X times, where X is the total number of power gained by enemies this turn. NL (Deal !D! damage).
${modID}:IceDevilBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies X+1 times, where X is the total number of power gained by enemies this turn. NL (Deal !D! damage).

${modID}:SurefireBrand.NAME: Surefire Brand
${modID}:SurefireBrand.DESCRIPTION: Grant dragonknight:Brand , Ethereal , and Exhaust to all cards in your hand. At the end of the turn, shuffle copies of cards Exhausted this turn into the draw pile.

${modID}:Puncture.NAME: Puncture
${modID}:Puncture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When Exhausted, first remove the target's Block.

${modID}:LavaImpact.NAME: Lava Impact
${modID}:LavaImpact.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage X times, where X is the number of Exhausted cards. NL (Deal damage !D! X times).
${modID}:LavaImpact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage X+1 times, where X is the number of Exhausted cards. NL (Deal damage !D! X+1 times).

${modID}:HammerBrand.NAME: Hammer Brand
${modID}:HammerBrand.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! temporary Strength reduction to the target. If dragonknight:Brand was triggered last turn, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:HeavenlyRevelation.NAME: Heavenly Revelation
${modID}:HeavenlyRevelation.DESCRIPTION: Every second use of a dragonknight:Brand card each turn, randomly draw a card with "dragonknight:Brand" in its name from the draw pile. Additionally, randomly put a copy of an Attack into the draw pile from the Exhaust pile.

${modID}:HeavenlyEtudeOfTheNadir.NAME: Heavenly Etude Of The Nadir
${modID}:HeavenlyEtudeOfTheNadir.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all cards in your hand back into the draw pile and place !M! *Etude *Of *The *Nadir+ cards into your hand.

${modID}:EtudeOfTheNadir.NAME: Etude Of The Nadir
${modID}:EtudeOfTheNadir.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Attack drawn will be Exhausted after use.
${modID}:EtudeOfTheNadir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Attack drawn will be Exhausted after use. NL Gain [E] .

${modID}:StrongWind.NAME: Strong Wind
${modID}:StrongWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each Attack played in this combat, increase damage by 1. If the Attack is Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand , gain an additional 2 damage.

${modID}:TrueEyeBrand.NAME: True Eye Brand
${modID}:TrueEyeBrand.DESCRIPTION: Enter dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form. NL If already in dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form or dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form and Exhausted at least 6 cards last turn, enter dragonknight:True_Dragon_Form.

${modID}:SettingBarrier.NAME: Setting Barrier
${modID}:SettingBarrier.DESCRIPTION: For this turn, each time the enemy gains power, deal !M! times the number of that power as damage to it.

${modID}:IceDevilShield.NAME: Ice Devil Shield
${modID}:IceDevilShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL cards in hand gain dragonknight:Anti-Brand.
${modID}:IceDevilShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL cards in hand permanently gain dragonknight:Anti-Brand.

${modID}:AngryTailSwipe.NAME: Angry Tail Swipe
${modID}:AngryTailSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If in dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form, gain an additional !B! Block. NL Enter dragonknight:White_Dragon_Form next turn.

${modID}:SteadyMind.NAME: Steady Mind
${modID}:SteadyMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to the Block gained.
${modID}:SteadyMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage equal to twice the Block gained.

${modID}:TemporalBrand.NAME: Temporal Brand
${modID}:TemporalBrand.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Randomly apply dragonknight:Brand to %d cards in your hand.

${modID}:AshenMana.NAME: Ashen Mana
${modID}:AshenMana.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, randomly select a dragonknight:Brand card in your hand, reduce its [E] cost by 1, and draw 1 card after use.
${modID}:AshenMana.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn, randomly select a dragonknight:Brand card in your hand, reduce its [E] cost by 1, and draw 1 card after use.

${modID}:HauntingMurmur.NAME: Haunting Murmur
${modID}:HauntingMurmur.DESCRIPTION: Enter dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form next turn. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL If any enemy was damaged last turn, gain !M! Block and apply an additional !B! Weak .

${modID}:DevouringBrand.NAME: Devouring Brand
${modID}:DevouringBrand.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the [E] cost of cards with the same name existing in the Exhaust pile by 1.
${modID}:DevouringBrand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Reduce the [E] cost of cards with the same name existing in the Exhaust pile by 1.

${modID}:HeavenlyLink.NAME: Heavenly Link
${modID}:HeavenlyLink.DESCRIPTION: Cards with *Heavenly in their name reduce their [E] cost by 1. Gain [E] every time a *Heavenly card is played.

${modID}:HeavenlyDescent.NAME: Heavenly Descent
${modID}:HeavenlyDescent.DESCRIPTION: Use ALL Exhausted Attack cards on enemies.

${modID}:HeavenlyJudgment.NAME: Heavenly Judgment
${modID}:HeavenlyJudgment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] . NL When Exhausted, gain 3 Strength and deal an additional 6 damage. NL This card returns to the draw pile after use.

${modID}:HeavenlyGaze.NAME: Heavenly Gaze
${modID}:HeavenlyGaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] . NL When Exhausted, randomly add copies of 3 Attack cards with Ethereal from the draw pile to your hand. NL This card returns to the draw pile after use.

${modID}:SurefireForging.NAME: Surefire Forging
${modID}:SurefireForging.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random dragonknight:Anti-Brand card in your hand, reducing its [E] cost by 1 for this turn.

${modID}:IceDevilErosion.NAME: Ice Devil Erosion
${modID}:IceDevilErosion.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, increase the damage of dragonknight:Anti-Brand Attack cards in your hand by 2.
${modID}:IceDevilErosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each turn, increase the damage of dragonknight:Anti-Brand Attack cards in your hand by 2.

${modID}:IceDevilForm.NAME: Ice Devil Form
${modID}:IceDevilForm.DESCRIPTION: When dragonknight:Anti-Brand Attack cards are played, trigger their Exhausted effects. NL Dragonknight:Anti-Brand Skill cards gain [E] when played.

${modID}:AbyssalVengeanceDrama.NAME: Abyssal Vengeance Drama
${modID}:AbyssalVengeanceDrama.DESCRIPTION: Attack cards marked with dragonknight:Brand by dragonknight:Be_Dragon will gain [E] after use in this combat. NL If dragonknight:Be_Dragon has been triggered at least twice this combat, add one *Approaching *Abyss to your hand.

${modID}:ApproachingAbyss.NAME: Approaching Abyss
${modID}:ApproachingAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Each dragonknight:Be_Dragon will reduce this card's [E] cost by 1. If the number of Exhausted cards is less than 25, add one *Abyssal *Gaze to the draw pile after Exhaust .

${modID}:AbyssalGaze.NAME: Abyssal Gaze
${modID}:AbyssalGaze.DESCRIPTION: If in dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form, enter dragonknight:Abyssal_Beast_Form at the start of the next turn if at least 7 cards have been Exhausted this combat.

${modID}:SwiftWindAssault.NAME: Swift Wind Assault
${modID}:SwiftWindAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If there are at least 2 dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards in your hand, discard all dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards, gaining !M! damage for each discarded.

${modID}:InvisibleSurefire.NAME: Invisible Surefire
${modID}:InvisibleSurefire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Scorch . If there are at least 2 dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards in your hand, discard all dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards, apply *Scorch for each discarded.

${modID}:SurefireForm.NAME: Surefire Form
${modID}:SurefireForm.DESCRIPTION: After dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards are discarded or Exhausted, draw 1 card. If any enemy has a debuff, draw 2 additional cards. Can only trigger once per turn.
${modID}:SurefireForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL After dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards are discarded or Exhausted, draw 1 card. If any enemy has a debuff, draw 2 additional cards. Can only trigger once per turn.

${modID}:SongsBrand.NAME: Song's Brand
${modID}:SongsBrand.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Vulnerable. NL Gain [E] . After being *Discarded or Exhausted, apply 1 Vulnerable to all enemies and draw 1 card.

${modID}:SurefireEntwining.NAME: Surefire Entwining
${modID}:SurefireEntwining.DESCRIPTION: For this turn, each use of a dragonknight:Anti-Brand card randomly grants dragonknight:Anti-Brand to another card without dragonknight:Anti-Brand in your hand.
${modID}:SurefireEntwining.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL For this turn, each use of a dragonknight:Anti-Brand card randomly grants dragonknight:Anti-Brand to another card without dragonknight:Anti-Brand in your hand.

${modID}:IceDevilRaid.NAME: Ice Devil Raid
${modID}:IceDevilRaid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard all dragonknight:Anti-Brand cards in your hand, draw an equal number of cards (up to 2).

${modID}:AbyssalGuidance.NAME: Abyssal Guidance
${modID}:AbyssalGuidance.DESCRIPTION: If dragonknight:Be_Dragon has not been triggered more than once this combat, enter dragonknight:True_Dragon_Form. NL If Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand, change to entering dragonknight:Black_Dragon_Form next turn.

${modID}:GoetiaBrand.NAME: Goetia Brand
${modID}:GoetiaBrand.DESCRIPTION: Every time after dragonknight:Be_Dragon, add a random dragonknight:Goetia to your draw pile. Each type of dragonknight:Goetia can only be gained once per battle.

${modID}:BathinBrand.NAME: Bathin's Brand
${modID}:BathinBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to twice the Block gained.

${modID}:BerithBrand.NAME: Berith's Brand
${modID}:BerithBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL Exhaust 1 card from your hand, Gain 2 Strength. Treat the Exhausted card as being Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand.

${modID}:GamygynBrand.NAME: Gamygyn's Brand
${modID}:GamygynBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL The fifth card you play every turn, if it's an Attack, will be Exhausted by dragonknight:Brand.

${modID}:OriasBrand.NAME: Orias's Brand
${modID}:OriasBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL Apply 5 Vulnerable to ALL. For the next 2 turns, ALL damage dealt is halved. NL Every time you play a Skill this turn, Draw 1 Power and reduce its [E] cost by 1.

${modID}:BelialBrand.NAME: Belial's Brand
${modID}:BelialBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL Exhaust ALL cards in your hand, Deal 20 times the number of Exhausted cards as damage to a target. For each Attack Exhausted, increase the damage dealt by 5. NL (Deals !D! damage).

${modID}:ShaxBrand.NAME: Shax's Brand
${modID}:ShaxBrand.DESCRIPTION: dragonknight:Goetia. NL The first time every turn you gain a power, choose 1 card from your discard pile and add it to your hand. NL The first time every turn an enemy gains a power, choose 1 card from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
